languages.text: {n}Во время перехода по звездной системе вас застает странная усталость. Веки наливаются тяжестью, глаза закрываются, а перо, которым вы водили по бумаге, составляя очередной приказ, выпадает из руки...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Во время перехода по звездной системе вас застает странная усталость. Веки наливаются тяжестью, глаза закрываются, а перо, которым вы водили по бумаге, составляя очередной приказ, выпадает из руки...{/n}

languages.text: {n}As the ship makes its way through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Во время перехода по звездной системе вас застает странная усталость. Веки наливаются тяжестью, глаза закрываются, а перо, которым вы водили по бумаге, составляя очередной приказ, выпадает из руки...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}During your travel through the star system a strange fatigue falls upon you. Your eyelids become heavy, your eyes close, and the quill you have been using to create yet another order on the paper falls out of your hand...{/n}

{n}During your travel through the star system a strange fatigue falls upon you. Your eyelids become heavy, your eyes close, and the quill you have been using to create yet another order on the paper falls out of your hand...{/n}

{n}As you travel through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy and close, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}

{n}As you travel through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy and close, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}

{n}As the ship makes its way through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}

languages.text: {n}当虚空舰穿越星系时，你感觉某种古怪的疲劳感笼罩着你。你的眼皮越来越沉重，手中用来起草命令的羽毛笔也掉了下来……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the ship makes its way through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当虚空舰穿越星系时，你感觉某种古怪的疲劳感笼罩着你。你的眼皮越来越沉重，手中用来起草命令的羽毛笔也掉了下来……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alors que le vaisseau traverse le système stellaire, une étrange fatigue s'empare de vous. Vos paupières se font lourdes. La plume qui vous servait à rédiger une nouvelle série d'ordres glisse de votre main...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the ship makes its way through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que le vaisseau traverse le système stellaire, une étrange fatigue s'empare de vous. Vos paupières se font lourdes. La plume qui vous servait à rédiger une nouvelle série d'ordres glisse de votre main...{/n}

languages.text: {n}恒星間航行の最中、奇妙な疲労感に襲われた。瞼が重くなり、命令書の作成に使っていた羽ペンが手から落ちる…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the ship makes its way through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}恒星間航行の最中、奇妙な疲労感に襲われた。瞼が重くなり、命令書の作成に使っていた羽ペンが手から落ちる…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mientras la nave recorre el sistema estelar, una extraña fatiga te invade. Tus párpados se vuelven pesados, y la pluma con la que redactabas otra orden cae de tu mano...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the ship makes its way through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras la nave recorre el sistema estelar, una extraña fatiga te invade. Tus párpados se vuelven pesados, y la pluma con la que redactabas otra orden cae de tu mano...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Während sich das Schiff einen Weg durch das Sternensystem bahnt, befällt dich eine seltsame Erschöpfung. Deine Augenlider werden schwer und die Feder, mit der du gerade einen Befehl verfassen wolltest, fällt dir aus der Hand ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the ship makes its way through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Während sich das Schiff einen Weg durch das Sternensystem bahnt, befällt dich eine seltsame Erschöpfung. Deine Augenlider werden schwer und die Feder, mit der du gerade einen Befehl verfassen wolltest, fällt dir aus der Hand ...{/n}

{n}Als du durch das Sternensystem reist, wirst du von einer eigenartigen Erschöpfung befallen. Deine Augenlider werden schwer und schließen sich, und die Feder, mit der du gerade einen Befehl verfassen wolltest, fällt dir aus der Hand ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Geminin yıldız sisteminde ilerlerken üzerine garip bir yorgunluk çöküyor. Göz kapakların ağırlaşıyor ve emrini hazırlarken kullandığın tüy kalem, elinden düşüyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the ship makes its way through the star system, a strange fatigue falls over you. Your eyelids grow heavy, and the quill you have been using to draw up yet another order falls from your hand...{/n}
